card.name: Alcadeias D, Lord of Dragon Spirits

property.name: Rules

card.name: Bell Hell De Linne, Footprint Demon Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever one of your opponent's creatures is destroyed, shuffle your deck. Then reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution Dragon, put it into the battle zone. If it's not, your opponent chooses and discards a card from their hand. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, this creature can attack untapped creatures until the end of the turn. ■ Whenever this creature wins a battle, this turn, your creatures in the battle zone can attack untapped creatures. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
Rules
Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks or blocks or leaves the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks or blocks or leaves the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. From among it, you may take a water spell that costs 4 or less, shuffle your deck and cast that spell for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, discard a card from your opponent's hand at random. Then you may put a darkness creature that costs less than the discarded card from your graveyard into the battle zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
Rules
Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each of your Dragons in the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, they can't choose your Dragons. (However, your Dragons can still be attacked and blocked.)

card.name: Bg Newton Custom Panzer, Dragment Symbol

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever your opponent draws a card, you may draw the same number of cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever you would draw a card, you may draw 2 cards instead. If you do, discard a card from your hand. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at your opponent's hand and choose a card from it. Your opponent puts the chosen card on the bottom of their deck and draws a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Galaxy breaker (This creature breaks all of your opponent's shields. After the attack, break all of your shields.)

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may put a creature that has Dragon in its race from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put one of your non-evolution creatures in the battle zone into your mana zone. If you do, choose an evolution creature in your mana zone that costs the same as or less than the number of cards in your mana zone and put it into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your Dragons in the battle zone gets "blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of the following. If you have an Angel Command in the battle zone, you may choose both: ► Choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap them: ► Add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. From among them, choose a Dragon and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If all 3 revealed cards aren't Dragons, return this card to your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return all creatures that have Dragon in their race from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever one of your Dragons are destroyed, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker" that costs 6 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your other Dragons in the battle zone gets "speed attacker". (A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ While you have a Dragon in the battle zone, this creature gets "Shield trigger". {GUARDMAN} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature from your other creatures to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and battle it with this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your creatures in the battle zone and put it into your mana zone. Then your opponent chooses one of their creatures in the battle zone and puts it into their mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your other Dragons in the battle zone gets +4000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a dragheart that costs 2 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) ■ If you have a light dragheart in the battle zone, this creature gets +2000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever you put a Dragon into the battle zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may take a Dragon, a non-Dragon creature and a spell and put them into your hand. Put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, draw a card. {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each creature in the battle zone gets "slayer". (Whenever a creature that has "Slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) ■ Whenever your Dragons attack, you may return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your other dragons in the battle zone can attack untapped creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your Dragons may cost 1 less to summon and your Commands may cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone that has the lowest power and put into its owner's mana zone. If there's a tie, choose one of them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature or one of your other Dragons would be destroyed, you may put them into your mana zone instead.

card.name: Kiriko Cubic, First Model Dragon Emperor

property.name: Rules
Rules
Rules
Rules
property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Each Light card put into your hand gets "shield trigger". ■ While you have no shields, this creature has "blocker". ■ When this creature would leave, you may have your opponent choose one of your shields instead. If you do, break that shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less. ■ Each turn, when this creature becomes tapped for the first time, untap it. ■ While battling, this creature gets +1000 power for each fire card in your graveyard.
